# daniel-burckhardt

`daniel-burckhardt` is my personal website built with jekyll.

URL: [https://danburck.github.io/daniel-burckhardt/](https://danburck.github.io/daniel-burckhardt/)

## Usage
```bash
# start server
$ bundle exec jekyll serve
```
